    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectTcp(java.lang.String ip)
      Connects to server using TCP, if the connection is unsuccessful it will try to broadcast to find the ip of the server.
      void disconnectTcp()
      Disconnect TCP client from server.
      void disconnectUdp()
      Disconnect UDP client from server.
      boolean isTcpConnected()

      Process packet by the type of packet.
      void sendPing()
      Sends ping to the server.
      void serverDisconnected()
      Disconnects client completely.
      void serverFound(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> servers)
      Connects to server if broadcast found a server and then update the ip address field in the ihm.
      void shutdownTcpUdp()
      Closes all TCP/UDP connection and stoping action executors and ping thread.
      void tcpWrite(java.lang.String msg)
      Sends message to server using TCP.
      void udpWrite(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String ip)
      Sends message to server using UDP.

      • connectTcp

        public void connectTcp(java.lang.String ip)
        Connects to server using TCP, if the connection is unsuccessful it will try to broadcast to find the ip of the server.
        Parameters:
        ip - ip address of the server

        Closes all TCP/UDP connection and stoping action executors and ping thread.

      • serverFound

        public void serverFound(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> servers)
        Connects to server if broadcast found a server and then update the ip address field in the ihm.
        Parameters:
        servers - list of found servers

      • processPacket

        public void processPacket(java.lang.String msg)
        Process packet by the type of packet. This method is called when a packet need to be process by the action exectors
        Parameters:
        msg - the packet
